arts.ttl: Chivu Set To Rotate Inter Milan Lineup Against Verona: Brazil & Netherlands Stars Set To Start
arts.sum: Cristian Chivu is preparing to rotate his Inter Milan side for Sunday’s Serie A trip to Hellas Verona, with three changes expected from the team that beat Fiorentina. According to Sky Sport, via FCInterNews, the coach is planning one adjustment per department as he manages the squad ahead of a busy schedule. arts.ttl: France International Back In Full Inter Milan Training Ahead Of Verona Clash But Not Certain To Feature
arts.sum: Inter Milan have received encouraging news from Appiano Gentile ahead of Sunday’s trip to Hellas Verona, with Marcus Thuram back in full training and officially recovered from injury, reports Sky Sport. The French forward completed the entire session with the group this morning, just days before the Serie A lunch-time fixture at the Bentegodi, via […] The post France International Back In Full Inter Milan Training Ahead Of Verona Clash But Not Certain To Feature appeared first on SempreInter.com.

arts.ttl: Official: Referee Appointed For Verona Vs Inter Milan Serie A Clash
arts.sum: Gianluca Rocchi has confirmed the referee appointments for Matchday 10 of the Serie A season, with Daniele Doveri selected to take charge of Hellas Verona vs Inter Milan. The match is the weekend’s early kick-off, due to take place on Sunday at 12:30 CET. arts.ttl: Hellas Verona vs Inter Milan - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Sunday's Serie A clash between Hellas Verona and Inter Milan, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.

arts.ttl: Argentina Megastar Expected To Start For Inter Milan Against Verona Before Midweek Rest In Champions League
arts.sum: Lautaro Martinez is expected to lead the line for Inter Milan against Verona before finally being handed a rest in midweek against Kairat Almaty. According to Corriere dello Sport, Cristian Chivu is planning to manage his captain’s workload carefully after a busy run of fixtures.
